name: Deathlock (raptor9999, Cade Conkle, CplD)
description:
A Metroidvania style 2D side-scroller game made for the Metroidvania Jam Month 10.

You are a space cadet who has intercepted communications. Now you must go and explore!

Controls: Game pad recommended but keyboard works also!

Move: A and D or Left and Right arrows or Left Stick

Jump: Space or Cross/A

Use: E or Left Trigger

Additional Controls (in game): F2
